entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
